fast-failover-max.help: Maximum number of retransmissions for fast failover HA messages between peer wireless controllers (3 - 64, default = 10).
fast-failover-max.name: fast-failover-max

fast-failover-wait.help: Minimum wait time before an AP transitions from secondary controller to primary controller (10 - 86400 sec, default = 10).
fast-failover-wait.name: fast-failover-wait

inter-controller-mode.help: Configure inter-controller mode (disable, l2-roaming, 1+1, default = disable).
inter-controller-mode.name: inter-controller-mode

options.help: Enable layer 2 roaming support between inter-controllers.
options.name: l2-roaming

peer-port.help: Port used by the wireless controller's for inter-controller communications (1024 - 49150, default = 5246).
peer-port.name: peer-port

peer-priority.help: Peer wireless controller's priority (primary or secondary, default = primary).
peer-priority.name: peer-priority

inter-controller-peer.help: Fast failover peer wireless controller list.
inter-controller-peer.name: inter-controller-peer

inter-controller-pri.help: Configure inter-controller's priority (primary or secondary, default = primary).
inter-controller-pri.name: inter-controller-pri
